exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce chain to an evaluable reference.

In environment A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] H : x \\In s Unable to unify "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class [posetof?M1468 * ?M1469]) in mx_leq) ?M1471 (pair_lim ?M1470)" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class [posetofA -> B]) in mx_leq) x (fun x : A => lim (app_chain s x))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
B: cpo
s: chain [posetofA -> B]
x: Poset.sort [posetofA -> B]

Goal:
x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s

Premises:
Notation cpo := CPO.type
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
fun_lim = fun (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : A) => lim (app_chain s x) : chain [posetofA -> B] -> [posetofA -> B]
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- Type] ?T' : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- Type] ?f : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- ?T'] ?s : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- seq ?T]
dapp_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- Type] ?T : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- ?A -> poset]
app_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- Type] ?T : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- poset]
pair_lim : forall A B : cpo, chain [posetofA * B] -> [posetofA * B]
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
pair_limP : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), x \In s -> x <== pair_lim s
onPhantom : forall (P : ?T -> Prop) (x : ?T), phantom Prop (P x) where ?T : [A : Type B : cpo s : chain [posetofA -> B] x : [posetofA -> B] |- Type]
fun_bot = fun=> bot : [posetofA -> B]
app_chain : forall (A : Type) (T : poset), chain [posetofA -> T] -> A -> chain T
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
pair_bot : forall A B : cpo, [posetofA * B]
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
fun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), (forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p
prop_supM : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : propPoset), (forall q : Prop, q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_sup s <== p
fun_supP : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), p \In s -> p <== fun_sup s
dfun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall q : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x), q \In s -> q <== p) -> dfun_sup s <== p
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
dfun_supP : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), p \In s -> p <== dfun_sup s
prop_supP : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : Prop), p \In s -> p <== prop_sup s
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
Poset.sort = fun t : poset => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : poset -> Type Poset.sort is a coercion
ideal_supM : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : idealPoset P), (forall q : ideal P, q \In s -> q <== p) -> ideal_sup s <== p
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
dapp_chain : forall (A : Type) (T : A -> poset), chain (dfunPoset T) -> forall x : A, chain (T x)
tarski_gfp_greatest : forall (T : lattice) (f : T -> T) (x : T), f x = x -> x <== tarski_gfp f
tarski_lfp_least : forall (T : lattice) (f : T -> T) (x : T), f x = x -> tarski_lfp f <== x
PosetMixin : forall (T : Type) (mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop), (forall x : T, mx_leq x x) -> (forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y) -> (forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z) -> Poset.mixin_of T
ideal_supP : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : ideal P), p \In s -> p <== ideal_sup s
pair_supP : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), p \In s -> p <== pair_sup s
image_chain : forall T1 T2 : poset, chain T1 -> forall f : T1 -> T2, monotone f -> chain T2
sub_leq : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T), {x : T | x \In s} -> {x : T | x \In s} -> Prop

``` 
intros.
unfold In. unfold fun_lim.
intros.
unfold leq.
unfold chain in H, H0.
unfold chain_axiom in H, H0.
unfold pred_of in H, H0.
unfold In in H.
unfold In in H0.
unfold app_chain in H.
unfold app_chain in H0.
unfold lim in H.
rewrite H.
apply pair_limP.
apply H0.
Qed. 
```

original: intros. unfold In. unfold fun_lim. intros. unfold leq. unfold chain in H, H0. unfold chain_axiom in H, H0. unfold pred_of in H, H0. unfold In in H. unfold In in H0. unfold app_chain in H. unfold app_chain in H0. unfold lim in H. rewrite H. apply pair_limP. apply H0.
